name: BizBash Media
tag_list: events, event-planning, meeting-planning, destinations, hospitality, conferences, party-planning, venue-search, top-100-events, new-york-events, conventions, trade-shows, premiers, event-technology, registration, attendee, attendee-engagement, event-apps
overview:
Founded in 2000, BizBash is the leading trade media for the event industry. The company is one of the largest sources of news, information and resources for over 150,000 monthly unique visitors on its web site, Six thousand attendees to its premier trade shows in New York City, Los Angeles, Chicago and Miami and a combined readership of over 150,000 to its national magazines and directories. Its professional and hidden audience of planners work in diverse types of events including consumer and b2B in the areas of meetings, events, philanthropy, marketing, PR, political, association, religious, fraternal, military and social. The focus of the editorial product is on event style and experiences at all sorts of events.

www.bizbash.com, provides users with access to comprehensive, searchable resource directories of over 38,000 vendors; photos and coverage of past events; archived magazine issues; a job board dedicated to special events-oriented employment opportunities; and BizBash Masterplanner, a subscription-based online calendar of events for the current year and beyond. The company also has a majority interest in The Event Leadership Institute- http://www.eventleadershipinstitute.com specializing in both video on demand training and live events.

milestones.description: Anthony Wills Named Chief Revenue Officer
